com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport
Class CoreItem

java.lang.Object
  com.i2group.apollo.model.data.transport.CoreItem
Direct Known Subclasses:
Item, ItemPlaceholder
public abstract class CoreItem
extends Object

The core parts of an Item that are also common to ItemPlaceholders.

Note: Starting at version 4.0 of the API, there are two different security mechanisms available, which apply on a per-Item basis. Before version 4.0, it was possible only to set and retrieve security permissions explicitly. At version 4.0, it is possible also to set security permissions implicitly, through the use of SecurityTags. It is possible to switch between the mechanisms on a live Item, but it is not possible to set explicit security permissions and SecurityTags at the same time.

Since:
1.0

itemIdentifierAndVersion - The ItemIdentifierAndVersion of the new CoreItem.
accessLevel - The SecurityAccessLevel that the current user has for this CoreItem.
grantLevel - The SecurityGrantLevel that the current user has for this CoreItem.

setSecurityPermissionsSignpost

public final void setSecurityPermissionsSignpost(String securityPermissionsSignpost)

securityPermissionsSignpost - A String containing the value to be set.

getSecurityAccessLevel

public final SecurityAccessLevel getSecurityAccessLevel()
Gets the SecurityAccessLevel that the current user has for this CoreItem.

Returns:
See above, or null when the CoreItem is not being returned to a client.

getSecurityGrantLevel

public final SecurityGrantLevel getSecurityGrantLevel()
Gets the SecurityGrantLevel that the current user has for this CoreItem.

Returns:
See above, or null when the CoreItem is not being returned to a client.

getAccessPermissions

public final Collection<SecurityAccessPermission> getAccessPermissions()
Gets the SecurityAccessPermissions for this Item, which dictate the user permissions required to access the data.

Returns:
See above, or an empty collection if this Item is using SecurityTags rather than explicit SecurityAccessPermissions, or null if the user is not permitted to see the SecurityAccessPermissions (that is, getSecurityGrantLevel() returns SecurityGrantLevel.NONE).

getGrantPermissions

public final Collection<SecurityGrantPermission> getGrantPermissions()
Gets the SecurityGrantPermissions for this Item, which dictate the user permissions required to change the SecurityAccessPermissions.

Returns:
See above, or an empty collection if this Item is using SecurityTags rather than explicit SecurityGrantPermissions, or null if the user is not permitted to see the SecurityGrantPermissions (that is, getSecurityGrantLevel() returns SecurityGrantLevel.NONE).

getSecurityTagIds

public final Collection<String> getSecurityTagIds()
Gets Strings containing the identifiers of the SecurityTags for this CoreItem.

Returns:
See above, or an empty collection if this Item is using explicit security permissions rather than SecurityTags, or null if the user is not permitted to see the SecurityTags (that is, getSecurityGrantLevel() returns SecurityGrantLevel.NONE).
Since:
4.0

isNewerVersionAvailable

public final boolean isNewerVersionAvailable()
Indicates whether a newer version of this Item exists in the data store.

Returns:
true if there is a newer version of this Item in the data store; false otherwise.
Since:
4.0
